评论详情: I bought this for a costume and expected it to be pretty cheap quality. It's actually quite nice! The fabric is thick and soft, and the lace on the hem of the dress is silky and hangs nicely. True to size.
Adorable and super comfy! Only thing I’d note is that the cover didn’t fit right due to me having broad shoulders. Material isn’t itchy at all.

i have sensitive skin so i was worried about the material but both the dress and sleeves are soft and stretchy so it is overall comfortable! the design is really cute and given the price, definitely worth it. i recommend getting your regular size for an a-line fit, but if you want it looser i’d size up.
This dress is very cute, has good stretch and good quality. It was worn as a costume and was perfect
Bought this dress for my daughter, she loves it. Cute, comfy and affordable.
fit as expected, stretchy, form fitting, straps don't dig into shoulders.

it’s much better than i expected. nothing classy, but decent for casual wear to a cafe or for a walk. nice cut. a tad loose for the size, but not too badly. quite pleased, especially for the low price.

Ordered a medium based on other reviews and glad I did. I’m 5’3” and 120 lbs. Medium is fitted but not too tight. Soft, faux velvety material. It’s thin and would recommend hand washing. The half jacket was not a medium fit and fits more like a US XS. I cannot button it and it hardly fits on my shoulders. Overall, dress is great, but would skip the jacket based on inaccurate sizing; shame because it’s super cute as well.
Absolutely beautiful set! Lots of stretch, beautiful detailing (especially the jacket featuring the Killstar style Cthulu print!), and well worth the low price!
